title: owncloud client 1.2.0 crashes under ubuntu 10.04
body:
good day,
owncloud client crashes after sync

uname -a
linux ubuntu 2.6.32-45-generic #102-ubuntu smp wed jan 2 21:53:06 utc 2013 i686 gnu/linux

cat /var/log/messages | grep owncloud
jan 31 10:56:42 ubuntu kernel: [ 7050.121717] owncloud[5941]: segfault at 88c03b0 ip 088c03b0 sp b691e1bc error 4 in libkeyutils-1.2.so[8993000+2000]
jan 31 10:58:01 ubuntu kernel: [ 7129.091187] owncloud[5988]: segfault at 41003b0 ip 041003b0 sp b4e401bc error 4 in libgvfsdbus.so[4386000+24000]
jan 31 11:05:11 ubuntu kernel: [ 7559.075400] owncloud[6108]: segfault at 6b113b0 ip 06b113b0 sp b3d1a1bc error 4 in libfusion-1.2.so.0.8.0[6bec000+8000]
jan 31 11:10:58 ubuntu kernel: [ 7905.595173] owncloud[6199]: segfault at 8be33b0 ip 08be33b0 sp b3cba1bc error 4
jan 31 11:11:40 ubuntu kernel: [ 7947.997115] owncloud[6222]: segfault at 5a683b0 ip 05a683b0 sp b3d1b1bc error 4 in libpng12.so.0.42.0[5a76000+23000]
jan 31 11:25:30 ubuntu kernel: [ 8777.906102] owncloud[6643]: segfault at 3e413b0 ip 03e413b0 sp b3d4b1bc error 4 in libfusion-1.2.so.0.8.0[3edd000+8000]
jan 31 16:09:26 ubuntu kernel: [25814.332985] owncloud[3050]: segfault at 40083b0 ip 040083b0 sp b45051bc error 4 in libqtiff.so[405a000+6000]
feb  1 09:44:48 ubuntu kernel: [ 2542.654265] owncloud[3196]: segfault at 1a7e3b0 ip 01a7e3b0 sp b3ca01bc error 4 in libqtdbus.so.4.6.2[1b86000+77000]

tried it on 2 pc with ubuntu 10.04, and i get this errors on both machines
